item.title: 11. Managing API Keys - Frontend Implementation
item.description: This post outlines the frontend design and implementation for API key management. 1. The design of the API Key Management 1.1 API Key Management Structure To visualize the layout, I sketched a simple diagram of the API Key management page. Left-side Menu Items: Under Settings, several submenus are available. Exchanges: Area for managing exchanges. API Keys: Area for managing API keys.
